Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming down 1187 from Crowley toward Benbrook and I saw 3 different sets of lights flying low to the ground, even hovering off to my left. I kept watching and they would go together and become more disc appearing and separate and swirl around and flash different colors of lights and it continued for probably about 5 minutes or less and they flew off toward the west, and before long they came back toward me and soon after I saw several jets flying after them until I lost sight of them. They were so cool to see, nothing like I've ever seen before flying around in the sky. I was excited, I just pulled over on the side of the road so I could watch them as long as I could. I was happy to hear several reports the next day of other people in the area also seeing them. I didn't know this network exists until tonight, so I didn't know who to report to that I had also seen them.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Crowley
There was one other sighting in Crowley on or around January 14th 2008
Summary: 3 separate entities that would change shape and go together as one, long and straight-looking then disc-like changing colors, fast and slow-moving, dancing low.
